IP address or domain of the isg: ip address or domain of the Internet Service Gateway
username for the isg: username of the Internet Service Gateway
password for the isg: password of the Internet Service Gateway
intervall for values to pull: intervall for values to pull out of the ISG
intervall for commands to pull: intervall for commands to pull out of the ISG (changes less frequently)
umlauts active: Activate umlauts in objects. Warning: could cause problems in history-adapter.
